saiƕis þo managein þreihandein þuk jah qiþis:
MARK 5.32 jah wlaitoda saiƕan þo þata taujandein.
MARK 5.33 iþ so qino ogandei jah reirandei, witandei þatei warþ bi ija, qam jah draus du imma jah qaþ imma alla þo sunja.
MARK 5.34 iþ is qaþ du izai:
gagg in gawairþi jah sijais haila af þamma slaha þeinamma.
MARK 5.35 nauhþanuh imma rodjandin qemun fram þamma swnagogafada, qiþandans þatei dauhtar þeina gaswalt;
MARK 5.36 iþ Iesus sunsaiw gahausjands þata waurd rodiþ, qaþ du þamma swnagogafada:
MARK 5.37 jah ni fralailot ainohun ize miþ sis afargaggan, nibai Paitru jah Iakobu jah Iohannen broþar Iakobis.
MARK 5.38 jah galaiþ in gard þis swnagogafadis jah gasaƕ auhjodu jah gretandans jah waifairƕjandans filu.
MARK 5.39 jah innatgaggands qaþ du im:
þata barn ni gadauþnoda, ak slepiþ.
iþ is uswairpands allaim ganimiþ attan þis barnis jah aiþein jah þans miþ sis jah galaiþ inn þarei was þata barn ligando.
MARK 5.41 jah fairgraip bi handau þata barn qaþuh du izai:
MARK 5.42 jah suns urrais so mawi jah iddja;
MARK 5.43 jah anabauþ im filu ei manna ni funþi þata;
MARK 6.1 Jah usstoþ jainþro jah qam in landa seinamma, jah laistidedun afar imma siponjos is.
MARK 6.2 jah biþe warþ sabbato, dugann in swnagoge laisjan, jah managai hausjandans sildaleikidedun qiþandans:
ƕaþro þamma þata, jah ƕo so handugeino so gibano imma, ei mahteis swaleikos þairh handuns is wairþand?
MARK 6.3 niu þata ist sa timrja, sa sunus Marjins, iþ broþar Iakobaus jah Iusezis jah Iudins jah Seimonis?
jah niu sind swistrjus is her at unsis?
MARK 6.4 qaþ þan im Iesus þatei nist praufetus unswers, niba in gabaurþai seinai jah in ganiþjam jah in garda seinamma.
MARK 6.5 jah ni mahta jainar ainohun mahte gataujan, niba fawaim siukaim handuns galagjands gahailida.
MARK 6.6 jah sildaleikida in ungalaubeinais ize jah bitauh weihsa bisunjane laisjands.
MARK 6.7 jah athaihait þans twalif jah dugann ins insandjan twans ƕanzuh jah gaf im waldufni ahmane unhrainjaize.
MARK 6.8 jah faurbauþ im ei waiht ni nemeina in wig, niba hrugga aina, nih matibalg nih hlaif nih in gairdos aiz, MARK 6.9 ak gaskohai suljom:
þisƕaduh þei gaggaiþ in gard, þar saljaiþ, unte usgaggaiþ jainþro.
MARK 6.11 jah swa managai swe ni andnimaina izwis nih hausjaina izwis, usgaggandans jainþro ushrisjaiþ mulda þo undaro fotum izwaraim du weitwodiþai im.
sutizo ist Saudaumjam aiþþau Gaumaurjam in daga stauos þau þizai baurg jainai.
MARK 6.12 jah usgaggandans meridedun ei idreigodedeina.
MARK 6.13 jah unhulþons managos usdribun jah gasalbodedun alewa managans siukans jah gahailidedun.
MARK 6.14 jah gahausida þiudans Herodes, swikunþ allis warþ namo is, jah qaþ þatei Iohannis sa daupjands us dauþaim urrais, jah duþþe waurkjand þos mahteis in imma.
MARK 6.15 anþarai þan qeþun þatei Helias ist;
anþarai þan qeþun þatei praufetes ist swe ains þize praufete.
MARK 6.16 gahausjands þan Herodes qaþ þatei þammei ik haubiþ afmaimait Iohanne, sa ist:
MARK 6.17 sa auk raihtis Herodes insandjands gahabaida Iohannen jah gaband ina in karkarai in Hairodiadins qenais Filippaus broþrs seinis, unte þo galiugaida.
MARK 6.18 qaþ auk Iohannes du Heroda þatei
ni skuld ist þus haban qen broþrs þeinis.
